name: Deploy to EC2 (Amazon Linux, root)

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "main" ]

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest   # GitHub Actions 기본 실행 환경 (변경 불가)

    steps:
      - name: Checkout source
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up JDK 21
        uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          java-version: '21'
          distribution: 'temurin'

      - name: Build JAR with Maven
        run: mvn clean package -DskipTests

      - name: Build Docker image
        run: docker build -t <docker계정명>/guestbook-app:latest .

      - name: Login to Docker Hub
        uses: docker/login-action@v3
        with:
          username: ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_TOKEN }}

      - name: Push Docker image to Docker Hub
        run: docker push <docker계정명>/guestbook-app:latest

      - name: Deploy to EC2 (Amazon Linux)
        uses: appleboy/ssh-action@v1.0.3
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.EC2_HOST }}
          username: root
          key: ${{ secrets.EC2_SSH_KEY }}
          script: |
            echo "==== [1] 이동 및 최신 코드 반영 ===="
            cd /${{ secrets.EC_USER }}/guestbook-docker-app || mkdir -p /${{ secrets.EC_USER }}/guestbook-docker-app && cd /${{ secrets.EC_USER }}/guestbook-docker-app

            echo "==== [2] docker-compose.yml 업데이트 ===="
            # GitHub 저장소에서 최신 docker-compose.yml을 가져오려면 다음 줄을 유지:
            # (만약 EC2 내에서 수동 관리한다면 이 부분 제거 가능)
            curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/${{ github.repository }}/main/docker-compose.yml

            echo "==== [3] 컨테이너 재시작 [문법주의]===="
            docker login -u '${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USERNAME }}' -p '${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_TOKEN }}'
            docker-compose down
            docker-compose pull
            docker-compose up -d

            echo "==== [4] 현재 실행 중 컨테이너 ===="
            docker ps -a
